English.npCredit: Game was made in conjunction with the noPILLS Organisation
English.L1-1: Snaily: Hey, you there! That fish there seems real nasty and hungry.
English.L1-2: Snaily: You should take shelter in that cave over there to the right (Hold finger where you want to go, tap for a speed boost!)
English.L1-3: Snaily: Glowing seaweed like this will hide you from bad fish! see?
English.L1-5: You: Why are all the other fish acting weird?
English.L1-6: You: Oh no, this doesn't look good.
English.L1-7: You: These pills are making me feel ill, yuck!
English.L2-1: Snaily: The pills are making all the fish act strange.
English.L2-2: Snaily: It is destroying our habitat.
English.L2-3: You: Things are only getting worse.
English.L2-4: You: Why do the humans keep throwing away their medication down the toilet?
English.L2-5: You: Don't the humans know that the best way to dispose of medication is to give it back to the local pharmacist?
English.L2-6: Snaily: You are getting closer to the water treatment plant, where all the pills are coming from.

German.npCredit: Game was made in conjunction with the noPILLS Organisation
German.Dialogue: Klicken und ziehen Sie, um fortzufahren...
German.L1-1: Snaily: Hey, you there! That fish there seems real nasty and hungry.
German.L1-2: Snaily: You should take shelter in that cave over there to the right (Hold finger where you want to go, tap for a speed boost!)
German.L1-3: Snaily: Glowing seaweed like this will hide you from bad fish! see?
German.L1-5: You: Why are all the other fish acting weird?
German.L1-6: You: Oh no, this doesn't look good.
German.L1-7: You: These pills are making me feel ill, yuck!
German.L2-1: Snaily: The pills are making all the fish act strange.
German.L2-2: Snaily: It is destroying our habitat.
German.L2-3: You: Things are only getting worse.
German.L2-4: You: Why do the humans keep throwing away their medication down the toilet?
German.L2-5: You: Don't the humans know that the best way to dispose of medication is to give it back to the local pharmacist?
German.L2-6: Snaily: You are getting closer to the water tretment plant, where all the pills are coming from.
